<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Récupérer les détails complets d'un exercice"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/exercises/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retourne les détails d'un exercice spécifique avec moyennes de notation et informations détaillées

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Identifiant unique de l'exercice","schema":{"example":"clh123456789","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Détails de l'exercice retournés avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"exercise":{"description":"Détails complets de l'exercice","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant de l'exercice","example":"exe_123456789"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Nom de l'exercice","example":"Squats au poids du corps"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description détaillée de l'exercice","example":"Exercice de renforcement pour les jambes et les fessiers"},"imageUrl":{"type":"string","description":"URL de l'image de l'exercice","example":"https://fitme-app.com/images/exercises/squats.jpg"},"durationMinutes":{"type":"number","description":"Durée recommandée en minutes","example":15},"formattedDuration":{"type":"string","description":"Durée formatée","example":"15min"},"intensity":{"type":"string","enum":["VERY_LOW","LOW","MODERATE","HIGH","VERY_HIGH"],"description":"Niveau d'intensité","example":"MODERATE"},"intensityLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label d'intensité en français","example":"Modérée"},"muscleZone":{"type":"string","enum":["UPPER_BODY","LOWER_BODY","CORE","FULL_BODY","CARDIO","FLEXIBILITY","BALANCE"],"description":"Zone musculaire travaillée","example":"LOWER_BODY"},"muscleZoneLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label de zone musculaire en français","example":"Bas du corps"},"isFavorite":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indique si l'exercice est dans les favoris","example":true},"averageRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note moyenne de l'exercice","example":4.3},"totalRatings":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre total d'évaluations","example":127},"userRating":{"type":"number","description":"Note donnée par l'utilisateur actuel","example":5},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de création","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de dernière modification","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","title","formattedDuration","intensityLabel","muscleZoneLabel","isFavorite","averageRating","totalRatings","createdAt","updatedAt"],"title":"ExerciseDetailsDto"}]}},"required":["exercise"],"title":"ExerciseDetailsResponseDto"}}}},"404":{"description":"Exercice non trouvé"}}}
 id="exercise-controller-get-exercise-details-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
